Table of Contents

Name

tpmc - TPMC, Powerspectrum, Massfunction calculator

Synopsis

tpmc [parameter=value]

Description

From a list of "particles" with given mass, position and velocities the two-point correlation function (TPCF), power spectrum (PS) and mass function (MF) are computed.

this program is under development

Parameters

The following parameters are recognized in any order if the keyword is also given:
in=
Input table, in ASCII format. No default.
out=
Output table, will be in ascii format. No default.
bins=
Number of bins for TPCF [12]
massbins=
Number of bins for MF [7]
particlemass=
Particle Mass [1e13]
rmin=
Minimum radius [30]
rmax=
Maximum radius [60]
boxsize=
CDM Boxsize [512]
mpvcol=
Columns for m,x,y,z,vx,vy,vz [1,3,4,5,6,7,8]
nmax=
Specify if input from a pipe []
bullet=
Give critical max. separation and min. velocity []
VERSION=
28-jul-2011 PJT [0.4]
